Reference

Package setup

reminders()

New R package reminders

use_these()

Wrapper function for package setup

use_authors()

Add author and license information to R package

use_clone_notes()

Add clone_notes.md to R package

use_lintr()

Add lintr to R package

use_hex()

Add hex.R to R package

pkg_authors()

Package author and copyright holder/funder

pkg_cph()

Copyright holder

SNAPverse information

sv_local_pkgs()

List local SNAPverse packages

sv_pkgs()

Location in the SNAPverse

pkg_titles()

Get heading information related to SNAPverse R packages

sector_members()

Get members of a sector

Sector packages

verse_attach() is_attached()

Attach SNAPverse member packages

sector_update()

Update SNAPverse sector packages

snapapps support

use_apps()

Use apps from shiny-apps repo in snapapps package

use_appdesc()

Create an app DESCRIPTION file

use_appreadme()

Create an app Readme.md file
